parameters.name: BabelfishPort
parameters.description:
The Tabular Data Stream (TDS) port of the instance for which Babelfish is enabled.

> This parameter applies only to ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instances. For more information about Babelfish for ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL, see [Introduction to Babelfish](~~428613~~).

parameters.name: ConnectionStringPrefix
parameters.description:
The prefix of the public endpoint. A valid public endpoint is in the following format: `Prefix.Database engine.rds.aliyuncs.com`. Example: `test1234.mysql.rds.aliyuncs.com`.

> The value can be 5 to 40 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and hyphens (-). The value cannot contain any of the following characters: ~ ! # % ^ & \* = + | {} ; : ' " , <> / ?

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: GeneralGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated cluster to which the instance belongs. This parameter is available only when the instance is created in an ApsaraDB MyBase cluster that runs MySQL on Standard Edition.

parameters.name: PGBouncerPort
parameters.description:
The PgBouncer port.

> This parameter is available only for instances that run PostgreSQL.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The public port of the instance. Valid values: **1000 to 5999**.
